title: The Avengers (2012)
description: Nick Fury assembles Earth's mightiest heroes—Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, Black Widow, and Hawkeye—to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)
description: The Avengers face Ultron, a sentient AI created by Tony Stark, who plans to eradicate humanity to save Earth.

title: Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
description: The Avengers and their allies fight Thanos, who aims to collect all six Infinity Stones and wipe out half of all life in the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame (2019)
description: The surviving Avengers devise a plan to reverse Thanos' snap and restore the universe in this epic finale.
